FuncDef: This command triggers the resolve procedure for dynamic IPv6 entries. When executed, aresolvemessage (Neighbor Solicitation) is issued for the requested IPv6 or, if thealloption used, for all the configured dynamic IPv6s.Theforceoption triggers the resolve process even for IPv6 addresses with an existing entry in the proxy-ARP table.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IPv4 or IPv6 address. Values-ip-address: a.b.c.d.
Runs the command for all configured dynamic IPv6 addresses.
Issues a resolve message even when configured dynamic IP entries are present.
